channel.title: The next TF2 update isn't very classy
channel.description:
[quote] After setting a new standard for Lack of Class in an FPS with the addition of Jarate (the jar-based Karate), we've raised the bar on lowering the tone even further with the first ever Classless Update! [/quote] [url]https://www.teamfortress.com/post.php?id=2726[/url]
[url]https://www.teamfortress.com/classless/[/url]
Look, hats!

item.title: The next TF2 update isn't very classy
item.dc:creator: raw_bean
item.description:
~kev~:

TF2 is an embarrassment to the Team Fortress Community.

Actually given the respective numbers of players of TFC and TF2, the “Team Fortress Community” if such a thing can be said to exist it is made up overwhlemingly of TF2 players, and therefore people with your silly attitude are the ‘embarrassment to the TF community’.

Read full topic
item.source: The next TF2 update isn't very classy

item.title: The next TF2 update isn't very classy
item.dc:creator: JohnKiller118
item.description:
~kev~:

Oh brother, lets just go ahead and finish destroying the name of “Team Fortress.” TF2 is an embarrassment to the Team Fortress Community.

Its really sad how the developers at valve have butchered what “could have been” a great game.

You and Tiki should get together some time. I’m sure you both would make a cute couple, what with your matching nostalgia glasses.

Read full topic

item.description:
The chances of getting a drop are not 100% so you actually get an item less frequently than every 20 minutes, but the game checks if you get an drop every 20 minutes.

item.dc:creator: Imonfire
item.description:
~kev~:

Oh brother, lets just go ahead and finish destroying the name of “Team Fortress.” TF2 is an embarrassment to the Team Fortress Community.

Its really sad how the developers at valve have butchered what “could have been” a great game.

Aww fuck now you’re not only bitchin’ about TF2 on Gamernode, but here too?

STOP. IT.

item.source: The next TF2 update isn't very classy

item.title: The next TF2 update isn't very classy
item.dc:creator: Kaze
item.description:
~kev~:

Oh brother, lets just go ahead and finish destroying the name of “Team Fortress.” TF2 is an embarrassment to the Team Fortress Community.

Its really sad how the developers at valve have butchered what “could have been” a great game.

TFC was a fun game, but it’s dead now and TF2 is eons ahead of it in both innovation and how stupidly fun and replayable it is. So what, it doesn’t live up to what you wished the sequel would have been, fuck you, it’s still a great game.

Go back to lubing up your dick with nostalgia and furiously stroking it.

Read full topic

Oh brother, lets just go ahead and finish destroying the name of “Team Fortress.” TF2 is an embarrassment to the Team Fortress Community.

Ah ha ha ha ha!

Oh wait, you’re serious.

item.title: The next TF2 update isn't very classy
item.dc:creator: Spooks
item.description:
TF2 Update:
  • Fixed Announcer overtime bug on KOTH servers using mp_timelimit

[INDENT]

  • Due to many requests, added server ConVar “tf_overtime_nag”. When set to 1, it keeps the broken announcer behavior[/INDENT]

HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA, FUCKING WOW[/SIZE]

Read full topic

item.title: The next TF2 update isn't very classy

item.description:
Spooks:

On the contrary, a Viking Helmet goes surprisingly well with the Soldier archetype of BATSHIT INSANE CRIT MACHINE OF DEATH.

I meant a proper SOLDIER UPDATE.

I WANT ONE.
Oh wait I don’t play that much anymore…fuck[/SIZE]

P.S. Shit I was right about frying pan… well sorta…
Wait for new soldier weapon - field kitchen!

item.description:
Apparently, there was a hidden link on one of the hidden pages, and if you were one of the first 11,111 people to click it, you got a little Medal you could equip your soldier with (hence the new Misc clot for stuff on the load out).

But bscly, it was america that got them because of the fucking timezones.

item.title: The next TF2 update isn't very classy
item.dc:creator: Spooks
item.description:
https://imgur.com/e5zV7.jpg

Holy fucking penis, look at that pot. Fucking shit, I was so gonna post that in this thread the other day:

Wasabi:

FYI, 18 new hats, that’s 2 new hats for each class. So the Soldier may have something slightly more sensible as well

Fuck sensibility, I want:

but I decided I’d put it off and then I forgot.

I would’ve TOTALLY called it.
